TopicTitle: How do I post images on this forum?

Articles.Content: Do I have to use Imgur or what? Whenever I drag a picture into this small little square I've typed in, It's just opening the picture itself, not posting it into the forum text. PLEASE ANSWER I REALLY NEED TO KNOW I LOVE PUPPIES PLEASE!!!

Write ""

Should work that way

(Without the inverted commas)

You can use the 

[IMG]-PUT THE URL OF YOUR IMAGE HERE[/IMG]

BB codes. Alternatively, use this page to find out all of the different codes you can use on here.

Also, I'll be moving this to the Forum Forum and leaving a redirect because this shouldn't be here.
I'm sorry but this doesn't work for me. I did exactly what you said and it doesn't work. Do I have to upload it on Imgur first or at some other picture sharing site?
Yup, the forum itself doesn't let you upload images so you need to upload them elsewhere and link them with tags
Oh thank you! I'll do that then.
I'm also having trouble with posting an image

Hi Shiva,

What trouble are you having exactly? Your image is appearing just fine for me.

Yeah, that was the first time I got one posted. I had to open an account at imgur. I don't know why I can't upload a file to my folder at KSP. You have two options for upload, from computer or Web. Seems like the one from the computer does not work.

Yeah, you can't upload images to the forum itself. You need to host them on another site (e.g., imgur). The forum has that capability, but it's disabled to lessen the bandwidth load on the forum, so it's more reliable and less likely to crash, especially in times of high activity.
